entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
